high_level_findings: Ownership check relies solely on mm equality, enabling ptrace/CLONE_VM hijack of vhost control ioctls.
Worker lifecycle and RCU handoff races allow stale vring->worker pointers and work execution after free/reset.
IOTLB/logging handling lacks synchronization on reset, risking stale mappings, info leaks, and data corruption.
Resource controls (attachment counts, worker creation, iotlb descriptors) permit unprivileged exhaustion of kernel threads and memory.
